text: Unforgiven (1999) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by the World Wrestling Federation (WWF). It took place on September 26, 1999 at the Charlotte Coliseum in Charlotte, North Carolina. It was the second Unforgiven event held by the WWF. ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Val Venis defeated Steve Blackman Singles match 6:33 2 D'Lo Brown defeated Mark Henry (c) Singles match for the WWF European Championship 9:11 3 Jeff Jarrett (c) (with Miss Kitty) defeated Chyna by disqualification Singles match for the WWF Intercontinental Championship 11:52 4 The Acolytes (Faarooq and Bradshaw) defeated The Dudley Boyz (Bubba Ray and D-Von Dudley) Tag team match 7:28 5 Ivory (c) defeated Luna Vachon Hardcore match for the WWF Women's Championship 3:37 6 The New Age Outlaws (Billy Gunn and Road Dogg) (c) defeated Edge and Christian Tag team match for the WWF Tag Team Championship 11:09 7 Al Snow (with Head) (c) defeated The Big Boss Man Kennel from Hell match for the WWF Hardcore Championship 11:42 8 X-Pac defeated Chris Jericho (with Curtis Hughes) by disqualification Singles match 13:10 9 Triple H defeated The Rock, Mankind, Kane, Big Show and The British Bulldog Six-Pack Challenge for the vacant WWF Championship with Stone Cold Steve Austin as the special outside enforcer 20:28 ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Unforgiven 1999 website Category:1999 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in Charlotte, North Carolina Category:WWE Unforgiven
title: Unforgiven (1999)
